channel.title: NYS:SNAP on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:SNAP on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Snap Second-Quarter Sales Fall Short on Advertising Glitch
item.description: Snap Inc. reported second-quarter sales that were shy of Wall Street’s average estimates as the company, owner of the Snapchat photo-sharing app, dealt with a technical issue with its ad-buying tools

item.title: Snap Second-Quarter Sales Fall Short on Advertising Glitch
item.description: Snap Inc. reported second-quarter sales that were shy of Wall Street’s average estimates as the company, owner of the Snapchat photo-sharing app, dealt with a technical issue with its ad-buying tools
